com.veraplan.teacherWishlist.Model

Interface CurrentUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrentUserImpl

    public interface CurrentUser
    CurrentUser defines a interface for providing information about the current user of the application
    Author:
    Lukas Stuckstette

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Person getPerson() 
      User getUser() 
      boolean isLoggedIn()

      sets the current users 'logged-in' flag

      sets the person entity of the current user
      void setUser(User user)
      sets the user entity of the current user

    • Method Detail

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn()
        Returns:
        returns true if the user is loggen in, otherwise false

      • setLoggedIn

        void setLoggedIn(boolean isLoggedIn)
        sets the current users 'logged-in' flag
        Parameters:
        isLoggedIn - true if logged in, false otherwise

      • getUser

        User getUser()
